data.title: Nordea Bank allows clients to trade synthetic ETPs pegged to Bitcoin.
data.description: Nordea Bank has announced it will offer customers an exchange-traded product (ETP) pegged to Bitcoin. Previously cautious about cryptocurrencies, Nordea stated that with the maturing regulatory environment for cryptocurrencies in Europe and the growing demand for virtual currencies and cryptocurrencies in the Nordic region, it has decided to allow customers to trade cryptocurrency-related products on its platform. Nordea will allow customers to trade a cryptocurrency-related product developed by an external company, CoinShares, on its platform. This new product will launch on the Nordea Bank platform in December 2025. (Bloomberg)

data.title: Nordea Bank to Introduce Bitcoin-Tracking ETP for Clients
data.description:
According to Foresight News, Nordea Bank AB has announced plans to offer an exchange-traded product (ETP) that tracks Bitcoin for its clients. Previously cautious about cryptocurrencies, Nordea has decided to allow trading of crypto-related products on its platform due to the maturing regulatory environment in Europe and increasing demand for virtual currencies in the Nordic region.

The new product, developed by CoinShares, is set to launch on Nordea Bank's platform in December 2025. This synthetic ETP is based on Bitcoin and is aimed at experienced investors seeking alternative asset allocations.

data.title: Cryptocurrency Market Experiences Significant Liquidations
data.description: According to TechFlow, data from Coinglass reveals that the cryptocurrency market witnessed liquidations totaling $1.148 billion over the past 24 hours as of October 30, 2025. Of this amount, long positions accounted for $984 million, while short positions made up $163 million. A total of 222,855 traders were affected globally, with the largest single liquidation occurring on Hyperliquid's BTC-USD pair, valued at $21.4298 million.

data.title: Ten Bitcoin ETFs saw a net outflow of 3,693 BTC in a single day, while nine Ethereum ETFs saw a net inflow of 5,135 ETH.
data.description: According to Lookonchain monitoring, on October 30th, 10 Bitcoin ETFs saw a net outflow of 3,693 BTC, equivalent to approximately $399 million. Among them, Fidelity saw an outflow of 1,482 BTC, worth $160 million, and currently holds a total of 205,365 BTC, worth $22.2 billion. On the same day, 9 Ethereum ETFs saw a net inflow of 5,135 ETH, equivalent to approximately $19.51 million. Among them, the Grayscale Ethereum Mini Trust saw an inflow of 18,101 ETH, worth $68.78 million, and currently holds a total of 743,453 ETH, worth $2.83 billion.

data.title: Blockchain Infrastructure Acquisition Race Intensifies, Analysts Say
data.description:
According to Foresight News, a report by CoinDesk highlights that analysts from Citizens Bank in the United States have observed an acceleration in the acquisition race for blockchain infrastructure. The analysts emphasize that the complex technology of the digital asset industry, coupled with a shortage of skilled professionals and stringent compliance requirements, makes acquisitions the most viable strategy for existing companies.

The report further notes that digital-native companies can benefit from joining larger financial networks, gaining scale, customer reach, and regulatory credibility. Tokenization is identified as a key driver of this activity.

The bank forecasts that as stablecoins and tokenized assets become mainstream in the financial sector, services related to transactions, custody, and data could generate nearly $100 billion in annual revenue by 2030.

data.title: WisdomTree Expands with Tokenized Funds on Plume Platform
data.description: According to Foresight News, asset management firm WisdomTree has launched 14 tokenized funds on the Plume platform. These include the CRDT private credit and alternative income digital fund, as well as a government money market digital fund. This integration marks the beginning of WisdomTree's multi-chain strategy. As part of this expansion, Galaxy Digital will invest $10 million into WisdomTree's government money market digital fund.

data.title: Injective Launches Community Buyback Program to Reduce Token Supply
data.description:
According to Foresight News, CoinDesk reports that Injective has initiated a new community buyback program. Community members can contribute INJ tokens to a fund aimed at purchasing and burning tokens, thereby reducing the overall token supply. In return, participants will receive 10% of the Injective ecosystem's revenue as a reward.

Data from DeFiLlama indicates that Injective's total value locked (TVL) increased by approximately 14% over the past 24 hours, suggesting a significant influx of new funds into the network. However, during the same period, the value of INJ tokens decreased by about 8%.

data.title: BNB Drops Below 1,080 USDT with a 2.56% Decrease in 24 Hours
data.description: On Oct 30, 2025, 15:18 PM(UTC). According to Binance Market Data, BNB has dropped below 1,080 USDT and is now trading at 1,079.189941 USDT, with a narrowed 2.56% decrease in 24 hours.

data.title: Federal Reserve to Roll Over Maturing U.S. Treasury Principal Starting December 2024
data.description: According to PANews, the Federal Reserve announced in its latest FOMC statement that starting December 1, 2024, it will roll over all maturing U.S. Treasury principal. This means that instead of withdrawing cash upon maturity, the funds will be reinvested in newly issued Treasury securities, maintaining the size of the balance sheet. This move marks the official end of a two-year balance sheet reduction process and is seen by the market as a significant signal of a shift in monetary policy from tightening to a more neutral or even accommodative stance.

data.title: LM Funding America Announces Share Buyback Amid Bitcoin Collateral Loan
data.description: According to Foresight News, LM Funding America, a Nasdaq-listed Bitcoin mining company, has announced the repurchase of 3,308,575 shares of common stock and associated warrants at a price of $2.41 per unit. The total cost of the buyback amounts to approximately $8 million. This financial move is funded through a loan secured by Bitcoin collateral from Galaxy Digital.

data.title: Bitcoin and Ethereum November Returns Show Historical Trends
data.description:
According to TechFlow, data from Coinglass reveals that since 2013, Bitcoin's average return in November stands at +46. 02%, marking it as the month with the highest historical average return. However, in the past 12 years, November returns were negative in four years: 2018, 2019, 2021, and 2022. Additionally, since 2016, Ethereum's average return for November is +7
source: https://www.binance.com/en/square/post/31715444562657?utm_source=BinanceNewsRSS

data.title: Standard Chartered Predicts $2 Trillion Tokenized Asset Market by 2028
data.description:
According to BlockBeats, Standard Chartered has released a report indicating that the cumulative value of tokenized real-world assets (RWAs) could reach $2 trillion over the next three years as more global capital and payment activities transition to more efficient blockchain networks. The decentralized finance (DeFi) sector, with its trustless structure, is poised to challenge the dominance of traditional financial systems (TradFi) controlled by centralized entities. Standard Chartered forecasts that as DeFi's application in payments and investments grows, the market capitalization of tokenized RWAs, excluding stablecoins, could reach $2 trillion by 2028. Of this amount, it is expected that $750 billion will flow into money market funds, another $750 billion into tokenized U
source: https://www.binance.com/en/square/post/31715455160146?utm_source=BinanceNewsRSS

data.title: "Smart money went long on ETH at 25x after the flash crash on October 11th." ETH long positions reached $73.39 million, currently showing a floating profit of $654,000.
data.description: According to on-chain analyst Ai Yi, the long ETH positions held by "smart money" (those who bought ETH at 25x the rate of entry after the October 11th flash crash) have reached 19,383.25 ETH (approximately $73.3 million), and all orders have been filled. The current average opening price is $3,741.34, the liquidation price is $3,219.96, and the unrealized profit is $654,000.
